channel.title: pilot on Yet another blog...
channel.description: Recent content in pilot on Yet another blog...

item.title: Pilot
item.description: We just decided to – Charlie, The Newsroom, TV Series 2012-2014 Well, Charlie was telling his friend, Will, that in the old days they did the news well; how? They just decided to. However, I’m not going to do any news, nor I will try to teach anything to anybody. I’m really new to this. This blog is my attempt to self reflect on the things I’m learning throughout my development in software engineering.
